recipesJson.name: Passionfruit Kisses
recipesJson.author: gravi-tea
recipesJson.description:
this passionfruit melon mix is one all my friends go nuts for. I thought I'd share. Enjoy!

tpa sweet cream & tpa vanilla bean ice cream carry the load for softening the profile while adding a smooth inhale/exhale

cap passion fruit is sweet and it pairs with fa's to create a well rounded passionfruit note

tpa dragonfruit plays it's typical role of emulsifier while avoiding becoming a contributor flavor

flv's wild melon is just an awesome flavor, it really adds something special alongside the passionfruit to help fill out the fruit note

you can vape it right away but I suggest you wait at least 3 days to let everything work together
